note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Nginx monitoring tool

This is a simple monitoring tool for static html pages, Python web applications and Php web application running with Nginx as its front webserver. The tool displays the applications list, upstream names and uri as well as process names and pids.
![Nginx monitoring tool running on a webserver](http://raphaelcruzeiro.com/static/screen.png)
name: Nginx-monitoring-tool
tagline: A simple tool for monitoring Python and Php applications running on a Linux machine using Nginx as its server
